title: Event Schema v1
description: Defines the structure of an event object, which represents a specific action or occurrence in your system.

$schema.description: The schema URI this object conforms to.

name.description: The unique name of the event.

description.description: A user-friendly description of what this event represents.

payload_schema.description: Reference to the JSON schema that validates this event's payload properties.

schema.description: The name or identifier of the payload schema.

version_no.description: The specific version number of the payload schema. If null, refers to the latest version.

workflows.description: A read-only list of workflow slugs that are triggered by this event.

last_triggered_at.description: The timestamp of when this event was last triggered (ISO 8601 format).

created_at.description: The timestamp of when this event definition was created (ISO 8601 format).
